com.sloman.rs.skocko.util

Class FragmentUtilKt

  • com.sloman.rs.skocko.util.FragmentUtilKt

  • public class FragmentUtilKt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends ViewModel>
      T      		 obtainViewModel(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment $receiver, java.lang.Class<T> viewModelClass)
      Kotlin extension method (woohoo!) setting up GameRepository from class GameApplication. It's one of the rare places in the app where the app context is used. Than, the ViewModelProvider returns the correct ViewModel using class ViewModelFactory

    • Method Detail

      • obtainViewModel

        public static <T extends ViewModel> T obtainViewModel(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment $receiver,
                                                      java.lang.Class<T> viewModelClass)

        Kotlin extension method (woohoo!) setting up GameRepository from class GameApplication. It's one of the rare places in the app where the app context is used. Than, the ViewModelProvider returns the correct ViewModel using class ViewModelFactory

        See Also:
        class GameApplication, class ViewModelFactory
